ags:resource.dc:title: COMPARATIVE PERFORMANCE OF GROWTH IN DIPLOID AND TRIPLOID TURBOT (Scophthalmus maximus L.)
ags:resource.dc:subject: Triploid
Turbot
Growth
Scophthalmus maximus
ags:resource.dc:description: In this experiment two groups (diploid and triploid individua of turbot (Scophthalmus mo.ximus L.) have been studied, kept under the same conditions of culture, over a period of 6 months. Along this period of time, growth rates did not show significant differences in tiheir behaviour (p=0.1 Pillais test, for N=285) after applying a multivariate analysis of variance (MANOVA) with a design of repeated measures. Similarly, the survival rates in this iwo groups did not show significant differences (p >0.05) according to the actuarial method (Lee & Desu test).
